title: [GAMEPLAY] River spirit nami is missing parts of her skin
body:
If she isn't laughing or dancing she is going to miss one piece of her back armor, but when you start dancing and laughing the first piece of the back armor will grow back for the period of the animation.

I am quite sure that it happens 100% can't remember not noticing it.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the awesome report. ^-^ Visuals are always helpful for issues like this. Looks like the team is aware of the issue. It doesn't look like this will be resolved in the next patch, but is something we're prioritizing.
